title: Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both widgets are children of the shell. The right tree and text only work on Windows. We can probably work around by creating the text editor as a sibling of the tree and moving it above the tree.
OB: When running the attached code with build 20020920, the left tree and text behave as they should on Windows and Linux.
EB: When running the attached code with build 20020920, the right tree and text do not behave as they should on Windows.
SR:
1. Run the attached code with build 20020920.
2. Observe the behavior of the left tree and text on both Windows and Linux.
3. Observe the behavior of the right tree and text on Windows.
